overview_of_class: Description and theory relevant to the cognitive, linguistic, and social development of individuals with different developmental disorders throughout the lifespan.
name: Typical and Atypical Development in Infants and Toddlers
title: SoC CSD 342-0-1 Typical and Atypical Development in Infants and Toddlers

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Description and theory relevant to the cognitive, linguistic, and social development of individuals with different developmental disorders throughout the lifespan.

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value: Students enrolled in CSD 342 are required to: (1) attend all classes (2) complete all assignments on time and (3) take examinations as scheduled. Students are not entitled to make-up assignments or to grades of Incomplete unless the instructor has approved such arrangements in advance.

subject: CSD
